text: Here's a song that searches out the middle place between the beginning and the end of things
A song from the other side of the marriage bed. The room is empty, the window is opened, the lover is gone, a laugh is heard in the stadium.....
a song for a beautiful,gracious,eternal woman.
This next song concerns the curious relationship between generations and
that even more curious place where the generations seem to meet one
another, which is usually over some altar or sacrificial block.
This is a song for the resistance
Sometimes the interviewers are sent after me to ask me questions, I who am the most confused of men.This is the platform iÂ have established.

There are songs of greeting and songs of parting and then songs to those we are stuck with.This is a song to one whom one is stuck with, one whom one is sealed in a long conversation and a long embrace.In the first two verses we examine their predicament from various points of view, for which the French would have many interesting explanations. In the last verse, I attempt to marry the poor devils.
